rows.label: bf11460100_0010
rows.name:
Your sword-swapping fighting style...
It's very interesting, you know.

rows.label: bf11460100_0020
rows.name:
It's still quite rough, though.
I'm a bit lacking in "oomph".

rows.label: bf11460100_0030
rows.name: It'll take me a while to get it down properly.

rows.label: bf11460100_0040
rows.name:
See, I wasn't actually talking about
the power or technique.

rows.label: bf11460100_0050
rows.name: Oh? What then?

rows.label: bf11460100_0060
rows.name: That connection you have, human and Blade...

rows.label: bf11460100_0070
rows.name:
It's like a bond of sorts.
I just found it curious.

rows.label: bf11460100_0080
rows.name: An actual...

rows.label: bf11460100_0085
rows.name: bond?

rows.label: bf11460100_0090
rows.name:
It's like that's how it's supposed to be...
Eh, I dunno.

rows.label: bf11460100_0100
rows.name: It does make sense.

rows.label: bf11460100_0105
rows.name: Laura-sama is alway with Shin

rows.label: bf11460100_0110
rows.name:
And you almost never find time to practice with me.
It's like he's her favorite.

rows.label: bf11460100_0120
rows.name:
Come on, don't say that!
I'm an equal opportunities Driver!

rows.label: bf11460100_0130
rows.name: Liar...

rows.label: bf11460100_0140
rows.name:
You're both my partners and very dear to me.
There's no favoritism, swear!

rows.label: bf11460100_0150
rows.name: Are you really sure about that?

rows.label: bf11460100_0160
rows.name:
I think Kasumi is a bit jealous. 
I have been with you longer.

rows.label: bf11460100_0170
rows.name: You think...?

rows.label: bf11460100_0180
rows.name: All right then.

rows.label: bf11460100_0190
rows.name:
Starting tomorrow, Kasumi takes the lead!
Good?

rows.label: bf11460100_0200
rows.name: Wonderful!

rows.label: bf11460100_0210
rows.name: You don't mind?

rows.label: bf11460100_0220
rows.name: It's all right by me.
